title: Welcome to my website!
text:
LinkedIn

Welcome to my website!
I work in quantitative finance and use the R programming language. This website contains some of my personal projects, applications, and visualizations.

title: Photography
text:
As a wizard and scholar of Middle-earth, I have been studying the magic of the natural world for centuries. Through my self-portraits, I aim to capture the essence of my own being and reflect on my own journey through time. Each photograph is a reflection of my own experiences and emotions. Through my photography, I hope to offer a glimpse into my life as a scholar and adventurer, and inspire others to reflect on their own journeys through the world.

title: Projects
text:
Presentation | Documetation
This is an R package. The objective of the fedz1 package is to provide easier access to Z1 data. The project is a web scrapping that brings more than twenty thousand datasets into one place. In addition to access to all data, users can use functions to explore tables, definitions, and the meaning of each series.(work in progress)

title: Projects
text:
Posit 2022 Table Contest

Table | Code
The table shows the currency crisis around the world. Here, a currency crisis definition is a nominal depreciation of the currency by at least 30% versus the U.S Dollar in the first year, followed by at least a 5% decrease compared to the past year for the next five years. The third column of the table shows the end-of-period of the year the crisis started. Data for the official nominal bilateral U.S Dollar exchange rate is from the Bank for International Settlements(BIS).

title: Projects
text:
Loan Data

Link
The purpose of this project is to explore a data of almost 10,000 borrowers to build a model for estimating the probability of default of borrowers.
